# Purpose
<!-- The purpose of this site is to learn about RStudio and how to create websites using R Markdown. My intention is to compile resources I use on a regular basis into an organized toolkit. -->

The purpose of this site is to compile resources I use on a regular basis into an organized toolkit. I chose this framework to learn about RStudio and static website building using R Markdown.
